content: Currently there is one Render library declared in https://github.com/girving/ray-render/blob/main/lakefile.lean, which depends on two upstream libraries, Interval and Ray. In order to minimize dependencies, Iâ€™d like to split Render into two libraries, one of which depends on Interval only (not Ray). Is there a good way to enforce this in the lakefile?
(The motivation is making the computational executables not depend on a bunch of mathematics, reducing the number of .o files built by several thousand.)
assert_not_exists in your Lean files might be enough
